name: After the Party
overview: Walking out of the lift, you were confronted by the staff holding glasses of drink. Someone had discovered that it was your birthday and they were going to celebrate! Things were in full swing when you hear someone mention 'Birthday Kisses'. So you crept quietly off, hoping that no one had seen you. How right you were. Sat in a cubicle in the gents', you made yourself comfortable, ready to wait until you could leave quietly. The only problem was that you fell asleep and woke to find that everyone had gone and security had locked the building leaving dogs to deal with intruders. Now you have to escape before they find you!
